title: HTML Fundamentals
subtitle: In this Section, we are exploring all the basics of HTML.

data.title: Installing VS Code & How Websites Work
data.description: Welcome to the exciting world of web development! Whether you're a seasoned developer exploring a new code editor or a beginner taking the first steps into the realm of web technologies, this guide will walk you through the essential basics.

data.title: HTML Fundamentals: Building the Web
data.description: HTML, or HyperText Markup Language, forms the backbone of the World Wide Web. It serves as the standard markup language for creating web pages, employing key components such as elements and attributes.

data.title: HTML Headings, Paragraphs & links
data.description: Welcome back to our exploration of web development basics. In this section, we'll delve into the importance of headings and paragraphs in HTML, uncover a handy VS Code trick, introduce the concept of a Bookmark Manager for efficient coding, and explore how to create links in HTML.

data.title: HTML Image, Lists, and Tables

data.title: Introduction to CSS
data.description: Welcome to the exciting world of Cascading Style Sheets (CSS)! data.title: CSS Selectors
data.description: Welcome to the CSS Selectors MasterClass, where we embark on a detailed exploration of CSS selectors. These selectors are the architects of style, allowing you to precisely target and enhance HTML elements. Join us as we dissect each selector, providing detailed examples and…

data.title: Inline & Block Elements in HTML
data.description: In the vast landscape of HTML, a fundamental distinction lies between inline and block elements. This section delves into their characteristics, use cases, and how they contribute to structuring web content.

data.title: Id & Classes in HTML
data.description: In this section, we'll explore the concepts of IDs and classes, understanding how they serve as styling hooks for HTML elements. Additionally, we'll delve into a hands-on CSS demonstration to showcase the practical application of these styling techniques.
